meanings.definition: A genus of shrubs and small trees in the staff-tree family, typically with colorful foliage and berries.
meanings.sent1: The evonymus in our garden has bright red leaves.
meanings.sent2: I planted an evonymus bush by the fence for its beautiful colors.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hid its acorns under the evonymus leaves.
meanings.sent4: The evonymus stood out in the garden like a vibrant painting.
meanings.sent5: The evonymus bush added a pop of color to the otherwise green landscape.

meanings.definition: Any plant belonging to the genus Evonymus.
meanings.sent1: She admired the evonymus in the botanical garden.
meanings.sent2: The evonymus in the park caught my eye with its unique shape.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit nibbled on the evonymus plant.
meanings.sent4: The evonymus plant in the corner seemed to whisper secrets.
meanings.sent5: The evonymus shrub was a delightful addition to the garden.

meanings.definition: The dried roots of certain species of Evonymus, used in traditional medicine.
meanings.sent1: The herbalist prepared a potion using evonymus roots.
meanings.sent2: Evonymus roots are known for their healing properties.
meanings.sent3: The wizard's spell required a pinch of powdered evonymus.
meanings.sent4: The evonymus roots seemed to possess magical qualities.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of evonymus filled the room during the healing ritual.
